plot: Realizing they won't survive future horde attacks on their military base, two lone soldiers set out toward a town of legend to start an odyssey of recovery . . . and retaliation.
title: Lego Act of Valor: Town of Defense
plot_es: Realizing they won't survive future horde attacks on their military base, two lone soldiers set out toward a town of legend to start an odyssey of recovery . . . and retaliation.
